channel.title: (GPG Key Transition)
channel.description: Key transition statement and verification steps

div.p: Today I'm announcing my GPG transition from my old, and now expired, GPG key: DAEE96513758BF6337F71E491066BA71A5F56C58 and 8FCAF4F0CBB0BB9C590C8ED11CFA8A9CD949D956 to a new master key 932F3E8E1C0F4A9895D7B8B8B0CAA28A02958308. The old key will remain vaild for a little while longer, but I prefer all future correspondence to be addressed to my new key.

channel.p: This transition document is signed by all three keys to validate the transition.
If you have signed my old key, I would appreciate new signatures on my new key as well, provided that your signing policy permits that without re-authenticating me.
